The depressing thing about tennis is that no matter how good I get, I'll never be as good as a wall. | Mitch Hedberg |  |funny, hedberg
Ask for what you want and be prepared to get it.|Maya Angelou||life
They that can give up essential liberty to obtain a little temporary safety deserve neither liberty nor safety.|Ben Franklin||freedom,franklin
